Text: yep its funny the reason they did this version so quick was i sent an email for the last version and said they had spelling errors so they redid it properly lol

@ groteputter

I would of suggest that you execute the file sandboxed.That way you will easily see what other processes are running at the same time.Use "Sandboxie" for this to make sure.
Also if you found autorun.exe in your temp.directory  i strongly recommend that you scan your computer properly for malware/trojans etc..

Good Luck

its because the loader has a autorun exe in too to load with and when it loads up it puts a temp folder in temp and deletes it after your done and close it ,its set too make sure u have admin rights for use also
and so u know there is no virus in this ,just the loader gets a warning if your security is set very high
